name: gulp-angular-to-webpack-css-injection
description: Step in migration from gulp generated project (by 'gulp-angular') to webpack4. Injecting all **/*.css files in coresponding angularJs-entities. Adding `import "./filename.css"` in the very begginig of file (controller, module, component)
author: Volodymyr Mishyn <pti.mishin@gmail.com>
